Strong story line, talented actors, clever directing. And best of all, beautiful scenery and costumes. Cannot wait for next season! Review Title: Remake Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2014/08/29 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['David Paymer', 'Tim Matheson', 'James Hayman', 'Joe Lazarov', 'Janice Cooke', 'Patrick R. Norris', 'Bethany Rooney', 'Jeremiah S. Chechik', 'Ron Lagomarsino', 'Michael Schultz'], 'Producers': ['Not Specified'], 'Starring': ['Rachel Bilson', 'Jaime King', 'Cress Williams']} Review Text: Predictable and kind of smarmy plot but it drags you in and keeps you there. I wish some of the actors would take classes but the deep South is the most charming part of the whole show.. Review Title: Predictable and kind of smarmy plot but it drags you ... Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Aquaman Review Date: 2020/04/29 Categories: Science Fiction, Adventure, Intense, Outrageous Product Description: ['Aquaman must retrieve the legendary Trident of Atlan to save the underwater city of Atlantis - and the surface world - from his power-hungry brother.'] Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['James Wan'], 'Producers': ['Rob Cowan', 'Peter Safran'], 'Starring': ['Jason Momoa', 'Amber Heard', 'Willem Dafoe']} Review Text: Zero acting all video game graphics.
I want those two and a half hours of my life back:( Review Title: Don’t bother watching Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/05/19 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Clint Eastwood'], 'Producers': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Arnold Stiefel'], 'Starring': ['Kevin Spacey', 'John Cusack', 'Jack Thompson'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Review Text: I absolutely love this movie. It’s great fun to show at a Halloween party. Kevin Spacey at his best! Review Title: Love this film Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/10/25 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Jon Amiel'], 'Producers': ['Sean Connery', 'Rhonda Tollefson', 'Michael Hertzberg'], 'Starring': ['Sean Connery', 'Catherine Zeta-Jones', 'Ving Rhames'], 'Studio': ['20th Century Fox']} Review Text: Not much more to say than Sean Connery… I would happily watch him just read the newspaper:)
It’s a delight to watch him age so elegantly. What a fine actor. Love the setting of his castle in Scotland in the beginning. Review Title: Good film Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2021/11/06 Average Rating: 4.8 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Kenny Ortega'], 'Producers': ['David Kirschner', 'Steven Haft'], 'Starring': ['Bette Midler', 'Sarah Jessica Parker', 'Kathy Najimy'], 'Studio': ['Walt Disney Pictures']} Review Text: Good Halloween fun, Too bad a glorifies bullies at the beginning but it all ends well Review Title: Good Halloween fun Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: The Ugly Truth Review Date: 2021/11/06 Store: Rated: R Format: DVD Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {} Review Text: Bought this film for my sister she had never seen it. Perfect birthday gift it’s definitely a good belly laugh Review Title: Great fun Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/05/02 Average Rating: 4.6 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Benh Zeitlin'], 'Producers': ['Chris Carroll', 'Casey Coleman', 'Philipp Engelhorn', 'Annie Evelyn'], 'Starring': ['Dwight Henry']} Review Text: Important film but not a light topic or story Review Title: Rough storyline Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/05/02 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Violence', 'alcohol use', 'smoking', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Robert Lorenz'], 'Producers': ['Tim Moore', 'Clint Eastwood', 'Michele Weisler'], 'Starring': ['Clint Eastwood', 'Amy Adams', 'Justin Timberlake'], 'Studio': ['Warner Bros.']} Review Text: Excellent acting and well written Review Title: Great baseball story Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/09/14 Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Audio languages': ['English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Autumn de Wilde'], 'Producers': ['Tim Beva', 'Eric Fellner', 'Graham Broadbent', 'Peter Czernin'], 'Starring': ['Anya Taylor-Joy', 'Johnny Flynn', 'Bill Nighy'], 'Studio': ['Focus Features']} Review Text: Weird adaptation I am a huge fan of Emma and all of Brontes stories, But the Director missed the mark on this one. It was made almost like a weird character of people. Granted fashions and styles and behaviors were much stiffer then but this was almost comically wrong. Review Title: Weird adaptation Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Review Date: 2022/09/14 Average Rating: 4.7 Product Details: {'Content advisory': ['Nudity', 'substance use', 'alcohol use', 'foul language', 'sexual content'], 'Audio languages': ['English Dialogue Boost: High', 'English', 'English [Audio Description]', 'English Dialogue Boost: Medium'], 'Subtitles': ['English [CC]'], 'Directors': ['Richard Curtis'], 'Producers': ['Tim Bevan', 'Duncan Kenworthy', 'Eric Fellner'], 'Starring': ['Hugh Grant', 'Liam Neeson', 'Colin Firth'], 'Studio': ['Universal City Studios Product']} Review Text: Great Christmas movie This is my favorite Christmas movie shows love in every aspect and so tenderly and respectfully. Review Title: Great Christmas movie Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Preferences and Patterns:**

- **Genres:** Strong inclination towards drama, romance, and festive films, with occasional interest in action and science fiction.
- **Actors:** Highly appreciates performances from notable actors, particularly Kevin Spacey, Sean Connery, and ensemble casts featuring strong female leads.
- **Content Ratings:** Prefers films with adult themes (violence, language, sexual content) but enjoys light-hearted and festive movies during holiday seasons.
- **Production Quality:** Value placed on strong storylines, clever directing, and artistic elements such as scenic design and costumes.
- **Mixed Reviews:** Enjoys both critical successes and popular entertainment; exhibits a tendency to dislike films with poor execution, despite high expectations.
- **Engagement with Themes:** Displays enjoyment in narratives that are nostalgic or culturally significant; however, critical of adaptations that misinterpret original material.
- **Rating Trends:** Generally gives high ratings (4.5 and above) to films that resonate emotionally or are entertaining, while being more critical of films that fail to deliver on storytelling or acting quality.
- **Event-Based Viewing:** Involvement in themed viewings, such as Halloween movies or holiday films, indicating an awareness of seasonal entertainment preferences. 

Overall, this individual showcases a discerning taste in film, balancing critical aesthetics with a desire for engaging storytelling, particularly valuing nostalgia and quality performances.

target_interaction.title: Fantastic movie
target_interaction.text: Fantastic movie Best movie Russell Crowe ever made. It is thought-provoking entertaining and educational. I enjoyed every minute of it and I have shared it with several friends on movie night at my house
